alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Monroe; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:13PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Houston, southeastern La Crosse, northwestern Vernon and southwestern Monroe Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 212 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brownsville, or 8 miles south of La Crosse, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Coon Valley around 230 PM CDT. Westby around 240 PM CDT. Cashton around 245 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mount La Crosse, County Roads G And H, Brinkman Ridge, Jersey Valley County Park, Portland, South Side Of La Crosse, Esofea, Goose Island, Highways 14 61 And County M M and Spring Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
